nodes.text: The Great Grass Plains, an area of green grass and rolling hills, were located south of the city of Theed on the planet Naboo. Lianorm Swamp was at one end of the Plains. Shaak Ridge was a hill on the Plains which overlooked a valley. In 32 BBY, the Gungan Grand Army fought against the Trade Federation in the Battle of the Great Grass Plains. The main part of the engagement took place on the Plains 40 kilometers from Theed. At the time of the battle, a redoubt was on the Great Grass Plains, along with ruins.

The Great Grass Plains first appeared with the release of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and its tie-ins. In the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns, the Great Grass Plains was mentioned in the DataBank entry for the Gungan civilization. The Battle on the Plains took place here.
